name: Diary of ZIP4
description:
The room where I live with the cat Nero. The story of Ella's escape from the room with a long corona! Interact with the objects in the room and solve the puzzle and escape my room! Depending on the number of puzzles solved, the corona ends or the happiness index changes.

In a warm, cozy fairy tale-like room that gives you healing.
Enjoy the 2D scroll point and click puzzle with your cute cat!

How to play

Find an object where you can interact in that location and click to find a clue and solve the puzzle

Play time : Find 3 clues for each day

Daily Ending : At the end of a day, the diary writes the feelings of the day and moves on to the next day

Ending : Gathering jellies makes you feel better and the happiness index goes up

Multi-Ending and hidden scenarios by the number of jellies collected
